header.disclaimer: An official website of the United States government

home-page.intro: Know what you're looking for?  Do a quick search and find information fast.
home-page.title: NRCS On the Ground

find-by-practice.heading: Find U.S. Conservation Practices
find-by-practice.intro: A conservation practice is a specific treatment, such as a structural or vegetative measure, or management technique, commonly used to meet specific needs in planning and implementing conservation, for which standards and specifications have been developed.

search-page.intro: Search for information on practice impacts, practice extent, and impacts of practice implementation.

location-search.introductory-paragraph: Find conservation practices and NRCS sponsored projects & initiatives in your location.
